Doomsday.NAME: Doomsday
Doomsday.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL fighters. NL Exhaust.
Doomsday.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, other enemies take up to 20% of this damage. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL fighters. NL Exhaust.

Tank Up!.NAME: Tank Up!
Tank Up!.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, NL lose 1 Strength, give !M! Dexterity.

Reckless Flurry.NAME: Reckless Flurry
Reckless Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to all enemies equal to your Block. You get !M! Frail. NL Exhaust.

Bolster.NAME: Bolster
Bolster.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards from your deck with the keyword Block. NL Exhaust.
Bolster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards from your deck with the keyword Block.

In Search of Armor.NAME: In Search of Armor
In Search of Armor.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand, then get that many random cards with the keyword Block.
In Search of Armor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand, then get that many UPGRADED random cards with the keyword Block.

Magic Armor.NAME: Magic Armor
Magic Armor.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you can add one of three random cards with the keyword Block into your hand.
Magic Armor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, you can add one of three random cards with the keyword Block into your hand.

Greedy Block.NAME: Greedy Block
Greedy Block.DESCRIPTION: The cost of all cards in hand is summed and the same Block is given.
Greedy Block.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The cost (+1) of all cards in hand is summed and the same Block is given.

Bag Of Gold.NAME: Bag Of Gold
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gold. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach Mask.NAME: Rorschach Mask
Rorschach Mask.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Rorschach-stains into your draw pile.

Rorschach:Block.NAME: Rorschach Stain: block
Rorschach:Block.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach:Damage.NAME: Rorschach Stain: damage
Rorschach:Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemy. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach:Energy.NAME: Rorschach Stain: energy
Rorschach:Energy.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
Rorschach:Energy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach:Heal.NAME: Rorschach Stain: heal
Rorschach:Heal.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach:Poison.NAME: Rorschach Stain: poison
Rorschach:Poison.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach:Vulnerable.NAME: Rorschach Stain: vulnerable
Rorschach:Vulnerable.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
Rorschach:Vulnerable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach:Weak.NAME: Rorschach Stain: weak
Rorschach:Weak.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
Rorschach:Weak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach:Pure.NAME: Rorschach Stain: pure
Rorschach:Pure.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status cards. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
Rorschach:Pure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status and Curse cards. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Fearful Symmetry.NAME: Fearful Symmetry
Fearful Symmetry.DESCRIPTION: Double Rorschach-stains in the draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Fearful Symmetry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple Rorschach-stains in the draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Rorschach's Journal.NAME: Rorschach's Journal
Rorschach's Journal.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, adds the Rorschach-stain to the draw pile.
Rorschach's Journal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of the turn, adds the Rorschach-stain to the draw pile.

Eye-Opener.NAME: Eye-Opener
Eye-Opener.DESCRIPTION: Until the end of the turn, all Rorschach-stains added to the draw pile will be upgraded. NL Draw a card.

Growing Stain.NAME: Growing Stain
Growing Stain.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Rorschach-stains. When played, permanently increase this card's Rorschach-stains by 1. NL Exhaust.
Growing Stain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Rorschach-stains. When played, permanently increase this card's Rorschach-stains by 2. NL Exhaust.

XAttack.NAME: Х-Attack
XAttack.DESCRIPTION: Rise - increase damage by !M!. NL Deal !D! damage.

XBlock.NAME: Х-Block
XBlock.DESCRIPTION: Rise - increase Block by !M!. NL Gain !B! Block.

Charging.NAME: Charging
Charging.DESCRIPTION: Rise - decrease cost by !M!. NL Add 3 random Powers with 1, 2 and 3 [E] to your hand, at this turn they cost 0. NL Exhaust.

Stay Focused.NAME: Stay Focused
Stay Focused.DESCRIPTION: You get Focus and slots for spheres equal to the number of yours [E]. Destroys them all, 1 [E] is restored with each turn.
Stay Focused.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You get !M! Focus and !M! slots for spheres. Destroys all [E] , 1 [E] is restored with each turn.

Supercharger.NAME: Supercharger
Supercharger.DESCRIPTION: For each skill played this turn, increases the Focus given by this card by 1.

Dream World.NAME: Dream World
Dream World.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand, then add the same number of random cards into your hand, they cost 0 [E] this turn. NL Exhaust.

Nightmare.NAME: Nightmare
Nightmare.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn Exhaust the most expensive card in your hand.

Poisoned Armor.NAME: Poisoned Armor
Poisoned Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Poison to the attacker.
